code:
defmodule Solution do
  @spec circular_game_losers(n :: integer, k :: integer) :: [integer]
  def circular_game_losers(n, k) do
    circular_game_losers(n, k, 1, MapSet.new(), 1)
    |> Enum.sort()
  end

  defp circular_game_losers(n, k, current_friend, received, iteration) do
    # Check if the current friend has already received the ball
    if MapSet.member?(received, current_friend) do
      # Return the list of friends who did not receive the ball
      1..n |> Enum.filter(&(!MapSet.member?(received, &1)))
    else
      # Add current friend to the set of friends who have received the ball
      new_received = MapSet.put(received, current_friend)

      # Calculate the next friend to receive the ball
      next_friend = rem(current_friend + k * iteration - 1, n) + 1

      # Recursive call for the next iteration
      circular_game_losers(n, k, next_friend, new_received, iteration + 1)
    end
  end
end
